name: 王賢達
objective: Chemical, mechanical and physical properties of cotton, jute, wool, silk, acetate, rayon, polyester, polyamide, acrylic fibers, polyolefin fibers, poly(vinyl alcohol) fibers, elastomeric fibers and aramide fibers will be studied. The tensile, optical, thermal, electrical and mechanical properties of fibers will also be studied.
schedule:
1. Cotton(2 weeks)
2. Jute(1/2 week)
3. Wool(2 weeks)
4. Silk(1 week)
5. Acetate Fiber(1/2 week)
6. Rayon(1 week)
Mid-term Exam(1 week)
7. PET, PBT(2 weeks)
8. Nylons(1 week)
9. PAN, Carbon Fiber(1 week)
10. Polyolefin Fibers(1 week)
11.PVA Fiber(1/2 week)
12. Elastomeric Fibers(1/2 week)
13. Aramide Fibers(1 week)
14. Mechanical Properties of Textile Fibers(1 week)
15. Physical Properties of Textile Fibers(1 week)
Final Exam(1 week)
scorePolicy:
Term Performance Including Attendance(30%)
Mid-term Exam(30%)
Final Exam(40%)
materials:
Handbook of Fiber Chemistry(M.Lewin ed. 3rd ed. CRC, 2006)
Physical Properties of Textile Fibers(J.W.S.Hearle and W.E.Morton 4th ed.CRC Press, 2008)
Fiber Science(S.B.Warner Prentice Hall, 1995)
